contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox road |country=KOR |type=EX |route=130 |alternate_name=Incheon International Airport Expressway |map=130 Incheon Airport.svg |length_mi= |length_km= |length_round= |length_ref= |established= |replaces= |direction_a= |terminus_a= |junction= |direction_b= |terminus_b= }} {{Infobox Korean name |hangul={{linktext|인|천|국|제|공|항|고|속|도|로}} |hanja={{linktext|仁|川|國|際|空|航|高|速|道|路}} |rr=Incheon Gukje Gonghang Gosok Doro |mr=Inch'ŏn Kukche Konghang Kosok Toro }} The '''Incheon International Airport Expressway''' is a [[tollway]] in [[South Korea]] connecting [[Incheon International Airport]] to [[Seoul]]. ==Exits and Junctions== * Sinbul ([[Hangul]]:신불) (For [[Incheon International Airport]]) * Airport Town Square ([[Hangul]]:공항신도시) * Cargo Terminal ([[Hangul]]:공항입구) (Westbound exit only) * ([[Yeongjong Bridge]] ([[Hangul]]:영종대교) * North Incheon ([[Hangul]]:북인천) (Eastbound exit only) * (Toll Gate) * Nooji ([[Hangul]]:노오지) (Junction with [[Seoul Ring Expressway|Seoul Ring Expressway (100)]] * [[Gimpo Airport]] ([[Hangul]]:김포공항) * (Gaehwa Tunnel ([[Hangul]]:개화터널)) * 88 (Junction with Olympic Expressway - south bank of [[Han River (Korea)|Han River]], not [[88 Olympic Expressway|Expressway 12]] of the same name) * ([[Banghwa Bridge]]) (not part of the expressway) * North Road ([[Hangul]]:북로) (Junction with the Han River's northern embankment road - not part of the expressway) ==See also== [[Image:NoojiJCT IncheonInternationalAirportExpressWay.jpg|thumb|left|200px|Approaching [[Seoul]] from [[Incheon Airport]]]] * [[Roads and expressways in South Korea]] * [[Transportation in South Korea]] * [[List of Korea-related topics]] * [[Incheon International Airport Railroad]] == External links == * [http://english.molit.go.kr MOLIT] [[Government of South Korea|South Korean Government]] [[Ministry of Land, Infrastructure and Transport (Korea)|Transport Department]] {{Public transport in the Seoul Metropolitan Area}} {{South Korean expressways}} {{coord missing|South Korea}} [[Category:Roads in South Korea]] [[Category:Expressways in South Korea]] {{SouthKorea-road-stub}}
